xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/885438-Breaking the Mesh 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Kadu Mark, a bright and smart student joins University under pressure from his father, Mr Anatoli, a prominent city lawyer who is overjoyed that Mark has managed to be offered a law course and is soon to become a lawyer like himself. However, at the back of Mark's mind, he is disgusted with the whole "Law" course idea because he wants to lead a different career. When Mr Anatoli finds out that Mark has quietly changed the course, will he sue him? Breaking the Mesh
